div.p: The Hilton Central School District is committed to educating each student for success academically, physically, emotionally, and socially. We develop self-directed, life-long learners who think critically and creatively and function as caring, responsible, productive citizens. We accomplish this by attracting and inspiring high quality educators, administrators and staff, and involving parents, volunteers and community members.

div.p: This page is maintained by the district communications director according to the web publishing guidelines of the Hilton Central School District. If you are unable to access or use any aspect of our site, please email ourdistrict webmasterso that we may provide you with alternative means of access or use. The district is not responsible for the content or accessibility of third party sites.
